io.netty.channel

Class ChannelHandlerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChannelHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter, ChannelOutboundHandlerAdapter, Http2FrameLogger

    public abstract class ChannelHandlerAdapter
extends Object
implements ChannelHandler
    Skeleton implementation of a ChannelHandler.

      • exceptionCaught

        @Deprecated
public void exceptionCaught(ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                                        Throwable cause)
                                 throws Exception
        Deprecated. is part of ChannelInboundHandler
        Calls ChannelHandlerContext.fireExceptionCaught(Throwable) to forward to the next ChannelHandler in the ChannelPipeline. Sub-classes may override this method to change behavior.
        Specified by:

        Throws:
